title: BHEL bags Rs 4,000 cr order for 1600 MW thermal project from Adani Power
description: Bharat Heavy Electricals Ltd secures Rs 4,000 crore order from Adani Power to set up 1,600 MW Raigarh Phase-II Thermal Power Plant in Chhattisgarh, with Unit-1 delivery in 31 months and Unit-2 in 35 months.
